dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Fax

1184065870.299620.300950@m37g2000prh.googlegroups.com
Fax
To:	Legal Support, DMCA Complaints	From: Graeme Grant
Fax: +1(650)963-3255	Pages: 5
Re:	Notice of Infringing Activity - Ref. 8584	Date: 8/9/2007
D Urgent	 For Review  Please Comment I? Please Reply	 Please Recy :le
Dear Sir / Madam,

Following earlier correspondence, please find enclosed a copy of the Notice sent to you in regard to a web site, which appears to be on servers under your control, that is offering unlicensed copies or are engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted materials published by; John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Ina, The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc., Thomson Learning Inc.


We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of these publications via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to hearing from you. Yours sincerely,
Graeme Grant Internet Investigator

The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc. 1221 Avenue of the Americas, 48th Fl. New York, NY 10020
United States of America

Thomson Learning Inc.
200 First Stamford Place, 4th floor Stamford, CT 06902
United States of America
E-mail: Internetl@publishers-antipiracy.com

Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following location(s): http:Hgroups.google.com/group/sci.math/msg/0934de500c634231

The above location is offering to distribute unauthorized copies of copyrighted work(s).

Statement of authority:

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Inc., The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc., Thomson Learning Inc., the owner or exclusive licensee of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Inc., The McGraw-Hil Companies, Inc., Thomson Learning Inc., its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this copyrighted work(s) via your company's network.
We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take. Yours sincerely,

Graeme Grant Internet Investigator
